meanings.definition: The quality or state of being gross.
meanings.sent1: The grossness of the situation made me feel sick.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't handle the grossness of the garbage left outside.
meanings.sent3: The grossness of the food in the cafeteria was a topic of discussion among students.
meanings.sent4: The grossness of the mold growing in the corner was a clear sign of neglect.
meanings.sent5: The grossness of the smell coming from the dumpster was unbearable.
meanings.sent6: Despite the grossness of the situation, we managed to find humor in it.
meanings.sent7: The grossness of the mud after the rain made it difficult to walk through.
meanings.sent8: The grossness of the stain on the carpet was a constant reminder of the accident.
meanings.sent9: The grossness of the joke made everyone cringe.
meanings.sent10: The grossness of the situation lingered in the air long after it was resolved.
